Articles.Content:
Hi there. I need a logo for this mission. It's a mission to the asteroid that Squad is releasing in a mission pack Soontm. The bad news is, I can't draw to save my life. The good news is, you guys can.

So, if someone could make me a mission patch appropriate for a manned mission to an asteroid, I would much appreciate it!
Send me a PM with what you want on it, such as names and such, etc. I'll give it a try.
NuclearWarfare; can you also do the MASA logo? The details are on the request thread.
